career.headline: Career at Leleka Construction
career.intro1: Leleka Construction is a company that has built its reputation for years on solid foundations – honesty, stability and respect for people.
career.intro2: We offer official employment, paid breaks and free accommodation near the workplace, as well as on‑time payments.
career.intro3: At Leleka there is no chaos or empty promises – from day one you know exactly what to expect. We also support legalization of stay and work in Poland, from documents to permits.
career.intro4: People are the most important at Leleka Construction. Thanks to your experience, knowledge and daily effort, durable and solid structures are created. Your ideas help us grow.
career.intro5: Join a team where your work truly matters, every day brings satisfaction and a sense of stability.
career.footer: Leleka – a reliable partner for hard work.
